description:
Mathematics > Standard Multiple Choice

Read the following SAT test question and then click on a button to select your answer.

What is the volume of a cube with surface area 54 times (x ^ 2)?

(A) 9 (x ^ 2)

(B) 27 (x^3)

(C) 81 (x ^ 2)

(D) 81 (x ^ 3)

(E) 729 (x ^ 3) 

正确答案>>>

点击查看第二页

description:
沪江英乐：今年的英国达人秀人才辈出，大帅哥组合 Collabro 翻唱《悲惨世界》原声《Stars》更是惊艳全场，他们五个大男孩走上台时，底下的评委本来以为又是一个男孩乐队略感乏味，但是当他们唱起经典的《Stars》的时候，顿时全场欢呼。

【大帅哥组合 Collabro 翻唱《悲惨世界》原声《Stars》】

歌词:

There, out in the darkness
A fugitive running
Fallen from god
Fallen from grace
God be my witness
I never shall yield
Till we come face to face
Till we come face to face
He knows his way in the dark
Mine is the way of the Lord
And those who follow the path of the righteous
Shall have their reward
And if they fall
As Lucifer fell
The flame
The sword!
Stars
In your multitudes
Scarce to be counted
Filling the darkness
With order and light
You are the sentinels
Silent and sure
Keeping watch in the night
Keeping watch in the night
You know your place in the sky
You hold your course and your aim
And each in your season
Returns and returns
And is always the same
And if you fall as Lucifer fell
You fall in flame!
And so it has been and so it is written
On the doorway to paradise
That those who falter and those who fall
Must pay the price!
Lord let me find him
That I may see him
Safe behind bars
I will never rest
Till then
This I swear
This I swear by the stars!

description:
This can't bode well for Dean Winchester...这对魔化的Dean Winchester来说可不是好消息...

... but it makes sense following the shocking cliffhanger that concluded Supernatural Season 9:...不过根据《邪恶力量》第九季的结尾来看，这样的决定也十分说得通：

Our beloved Dean is now a demon (or at least has the eyes of one at this point), so the King of Hell himself must be playing a key role this fall, right?我们亲爱的Dean现在已经变成恶魔了，地狱之王怎么也该起起作用了，不是么？

The CW has confirmed that Mark Sheppard will be a series regular on Supernatural Season 10, joining Misha Collins in that capacity, as the network also announced this month that Castiel will return to a full-time role next year.CW电视台已经确认Mark Sheppard将会和Misha Collins一起成为《邪恶力量》第十季的常规角色，电视台之前曾经宣布Castiel将会在下一季全季回归。

No word yet on just how many episodes will include Crowley, but it's safe to say he'll be around a quite often to make life miserable for our demon hunters.目前还没有消息显示Crowley将会回归多少集，不过可以肯定的是他的戏份大增意味着他肯定会给捉鬼小伙伴们带来不少麻烦就是了。

description:
沪江英乐：英国电子乐队 La Roux 最新单曲《Let Me Down Gently》MV释出！主唱 Elly Jackson 特立独行孤芳自赏的嗓音疯狂的沉溺在 Electro Pop 中。中性混淆的打扮和苍白的皮肤会带回到 New Wave 音乐时期。

【英国电子乐队 La Roux 新单《Let Me Down Gently》】

歌词：

Let me down gently
That's what I think I need
But when you let me down gently
It still feels it hard, hard
Turn me into someone good
That's what I really need
Tel me that I'm someone good
So we're not so far apart, apart
I hope it doesn't seem like I'm young and foolish and green
Let me in for a minute
I love my life but I want you in it

Set me up I'm solely
That's what you do to me
Oh you set me up slowly
Now I can't come down, down
Let me down gently
That's what I think you need
But when I let you down gently
And you try to hide your frowns, frowns
I hope it doesn't seem like I'm young and foolish and green
Let me in for a minute
I love my life but I want you in it

And I hope it seeking in
Let behind your perfect skin
There's a part of your that's free
And I know there's a place for me

Let me down gently
That's what I think I need
But when you let me down gently
It still feels it hard, hard
Turn me into someone good
That's what I really need
Tel me that I'm someone good
So we're not so far apart, apart

I hope it doesn't seem like I'm young and foolish and green
Let me in for a minute
I love my life but I want you in it

And I hope it seeking in
Let behind your perfect skin
There's a part of your that's free
And I know there's a place for me
